dmca.title: Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
I am writing to you respectfully today to please inform your client COG1, has made an unauthorized use of my copyrighted photography work entitled [whiteparty408.jpg] and has converted my work into compressed flash movie appearing as the 1st image after the count down of 10-1 within this flash movie.
hosted from this website:

http://media.cog1.com/rubyskye/resolution_vi/camera_pix.swf
IP ADDRESS	NETWORK NAME	HOST NAME
69.57.156.93	EVRY-BLK-13	media.cog1.com

As you client COG1, neither asked for nor received permission to use the Work as the basis for [whiteparty408.jpg] nor to make or distribute copies, including electronic copies, of same, I believe your client COG1 willfully infringed my rights under DMCA 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein and 

I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all infringing works derived from the copyrighted work, and all copies, including electronic copies, be destroyed immediately and that you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future. 

I have reserved all rights in the work by being the original author of work on June 7th, 2003, and the first published on June 11th, 2003 which includes a copyright notice,
